title: (x) ADM Logo - (similar to) Eurostile {Mark S}
content:
Hey all-

I'm trying to find the typeface for the line 'Supermarket to the world' on this old ADM logo. Have to recreate it for a doc (couldn't find any larger sizes on the web). And any idea how they distorted the text like that? My first guess is align text to path in illustrator... Thanks so much. -Yussef

[http://i41.tinypic.com/izuw07.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123631/http:/i41.tinypic.com/izuw07.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ADM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123631/http:/typophile.com/files/ADM.jpg) | 34.01 KB |
author: creatif

comments.content: Very bad sample, looks kinda helvetica(semi)boldish.

You can see the logo better here:

[http://ns1763.ca/rail/whr-minas-15469.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123631/http:/ns1763.ca/rail/whr-minas-15469.jpg "http://ns1763.ca/rail/whr-minas-15469.jpg")

It may be custom, but [Eurostile Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123631/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/eurostile/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D131%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DADM%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D23) would be a close match.
